sub_title: Working at the intersection of Corporates & Startups to accelerate impact for the SDGs >> Strategy & Operations Lead at Unilever Foundry | Action Accelerator Founder | Public Speaker & Facilitator
summary:
Where there is a challenge, an idea to transform into reality, people to motivate and connect with, and an impact to make towards a better world, that is the place I have to be – making things happen.
 
Simply said: I accelerate action.
              Action that creates growth and a positive impact for everything and everyone involved.

I do this through a deep desire to bring people together for more powerful outcome and through curiosity of each layer to figure out HOW.
>I ignite the community that will collaborate, bringing a force of diverse cultures, perspectives, and experiences to the table, virtual or physical. 
>I build programs that transform ideas into action or current actions into more powerful ways of working.
>I find loose ends, silos, and gaps and design human-centric, contextually-relevant, and dynamic solutions. 
>I have the brave, but sometimes messy and hard, conversations to create alignment, breakdown barriers, and empower leadership. 

I am an action accelerator and in my approach, warm, tenacious, courageous, collaborative, optimistic, and authentically “PJ”. 	
Always looking for the next impactful cause or untapped opportunity to design the way forward for and make action happen NOW.

My purpose is to choreograph connection, collaboration, and compassion for each other and Mother Nature. 

This is how I do my part.

awards.title: One Young World Ambassador
awards.description: Selected as one of 35 Unilever employees to attend One Young World 2017 Summit in Bogota, Colombia along with 1300 other young leaders from 194 countries working to drive the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals.

awards.title: Enactus Alumni Under 30 Award
awards.description: Recognized for annual Alumni Under 30 award by Enactus for work with build an alumni strategy in the US for the Enactus organization - see profile for more info!

profile_positions.description:
An action-packed 7 month sabbatical cover, focused on building my Strategic Operations expertise:

• Crafted the narrative on the program’s unique value propositions, hand-in-hand with current partners and agencies, in order to engage new internal and external partners - deliverables included a new MASTER Narrative, Partner Building Toolkits per partner type and Communication Toolkits for current TRANSFORM delivery partners
• Designed & optimized the user journey of how our internal audiences (Unilever employees) gain value from the TRANSFORM program - deliverables included a new one stop internal website to guide employees on how to engage with TRANSFORM and new partnerships with HR on their priority employee development programs (stretching from senior leaders to early career professionals)
• Built & tested the pathway to build new partnerships - deliverables included both the HOW (strategy & tools) and the WHAT (attending external events & sourcing potential partners)
• Explored future business models to scale impact to social enterprises, corporates, donors, investors, professionals and academics - deliverable was a co-designed global/local operating structure to take to pilot phase
profile_positions.title: TRANSFORM Program Manager, Global Sustainability

profile_positions.description:
•	Led a 1000+ person global brand community, embedding purpose-first & one-team culture, cascading strategy in collaborative & innovative ways (testing new virtual facilitation tools and pioneering annual 4-day interactive brand community summit), and building tools for onboarding and best practice sharing
•	Facilitated agile process to turn strategy into action; managed transition to agile ways of working on global team, including acting as first Product Owner & SCRUM Master + choreographed global business planning rhythm with country-level teams
•	Partnered with cross-functional business teams to lead brand transformation of products & recipes, including embedding our plan to reinvent food through the Future 50 Foods and improved product transparency
profile_positions.title: Global Brand Community Lead and Product Transformation Manager, Knorr

profile_positions.description:
•	Launched new premium line of products, implementing new promotional & in-store strategy, secondary display, and PR/media
•	Designed & activated national promotional program across 20+ retailers driving incremental $6 million to Knorr business
•	Managed operations including sales forecasting, budgets, promotional planning, customer team communication
•	Ignited & led team culture initiatives to create increased connectedness across cross-functional team including onboarding program for all new team members, monthly cooking sessions to ignite foodie mindset, and fun events (i.e. karaoke & ski trips)
profile_positions.title: Associate Brand Manager & Team Culture Lead, Knorr

profile_positions.description:
•	Manage Leadership Team of 15 people to execute plans for recruitment, employee engagement, and meeting sustainability goals aligned to the United Nations’ Global Goals for Sustainable Development  
•	Key team accomplishments include hiring 40+ Enactus full-time employees, connecting 15 sustainability organizations at Unilever to build one strategy, working to solve Global Goal 2: Zero Hunger with a project grant impacting +70,000ppl with nutrition education and access to healthy food options, building employer brand through experiential brand activations at student events
•	Enhanced global partnerships in key Enactus countries – during rotation in Brazil, built an integrated program between the Unilever Future Leaders Program, Enactus and Unilever’s sustainability team to improve value for all stakeholders
profile_positions.title: Unilever Enactus President

profile_positions.description:
4-month international rotation as part of Unilever Future Leaders Program

•	Led cross-functional profit savings project – built action plan to improve profit by 15 percentage points in three years
•	Built digital asset playbook with media partners (Google, Facebook) to influence more innovative & efficient promotional tactics
•	Led packaging transition of product portfolio – overcoming tight deadlines and identifying process improvements
profile_positions.title: Oral Care Associate Brand Manager

profile_positions.description:
Target Associate Shopper Marketing Manager, Minneapolis, MN
January 2015-December 2015

•	Led Personal Care programs including In-Store Beauty Consultant program, Dove Men+Care Father’s Day program & Always-On NCAA Men’s Grooming program including a first of its kind experiential grooming event in partnership with local sports teams
profile_positions.title: Management Trainee - Year 3

profile_positions.description:
Part of the first class of the North American Unilever Future Leaders Program (NA UFLP) 2013 - rotating over three years through various Sales and Marketing roles.

Breyers Assistant Brand Development Manager 	
April 2014-December 2014

•	Embedded Unilever Sustainability mindset in brand teams through monthly learning sessions, engaging over 30 team members
profile_positions.title: Management Trainee - Year 2

profile_positions.description:
Part of the first class of the North American Unilever Future Leaders Program (NA UFLP) 2013 - rotating over three years through various Sales and Marketing roles.

Northeast Grocery Division Sales Analyst

•	Drafted action plan to grow Ice Cream share; secured over $2 million of incremental trade funding to support brands
•	Redesigned analysis and reporting processes; improved efficiency by 50% and trained teams on improvements
•	Leveraged retail experience, creating planograms specifically for urban markets & pitched to senior leadership

Retail Sales Representative	
July 2013-December 2013

•	Designed tools that all US city-based sales representatives can use – i.e. Unilever brand one pagers with key selling points
profile_positions.title: Management Trainee - Year 1

profile_positions.description: Co-creator & executor of an annual fast-paced hackathon to accelerate action on projects to deliver the United Nations Global Goals for Sustainable Development by 2030. Living my personal passion around partnership, this event brings together the members of three like-minded organizations - One Young World, Enactus Alumni, and the Circle of Young Intrapreneurs - to collaborate across cultures, industries, and generations.
profile_positions.title: Action Accelerator Founder & Lead

profile_positions.description:
I love sharing my experience and/or hosting positive impact events; open for more opportunities (message me)!
Topics: Living with purpose, leading with strengths, the impact of self-reflection & continuous growth, accelerating innovation, building diverse & inclusive networks, creating & nurturing internal culture, SDG #17 case study, how to take action now/building action plans 
Experience: Enactus National & World Cup events, Co.Create podcast, MasterCard ANZ Career Week, Flagler College Business Course
profile_positions.title: Public Speaker & Host

profile_positions.description: Leading development of 1st Camp 2030 program including virtual pre-event leadership development series, in-person 6-day SDG innovation hackathon, and post-event support for top ideas to flourish. This includes executing the event in September 2022 live in New York.
profile_positions.title: Camp 2030 Program Manager

profile_positions.description:
•	Built Alumni Advisory Group for Enactus, taking on the role of co-lead to connect and activate alumni network

•	Continuing to work with partners from Kraft-Heinz, Pepsico and Wells Fargo to build fundraising efforts, host consistent local chapter activations and develop a mid-career recruitment model
profile_positions.title: Alumni Advisory Group Co-Lead

profile_positions.description:

•	Generated North American Business Waste reporting to ensure accountability, proactive management of inventory, and reduction of inventory write-offs equivalent to 1% of turnover.
•	Implemented user-friendly reporting guidelines and trained new team member on daily and monthly processes.
